title: Big Buck Bunny
description: Three rodents amuse themselves by harassing creatures of the forest. However, when they mess with a bunny, he decides to teach them a lesson.

title: Sintel
description: A lonely young woman, Sintel, helps and befriends a dragon, whom she calls Scales. But when he is kidnapped by an adult dragon, Sintel decides to embark on a dangerous quest to find her lost friend Scales.

title: Tears of Steel
description: In an apocalyptic future, a group of soldiers and scientists takes refuge in Amsterdam to try to stop an army of robots that threatens the planet.

title: Elephant's Dream
description: Friends Proog and Emo journey inside the folds of a seemingly infinite Machine, exploring the dark and twisted complex of wires, gears, and cogs, until a moment of conflict negates all their assumptions.

title: Your Name.
description: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
description: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat capable of destroying all realities.
director: Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman

title: Joker
description: A mentally troubled comedian is driven to madness and becomes a psychopathic criminal.

title: Schindler's List
description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The life of Forrest Gump, a man with a low IQ, as he recounts the early years of his life and unexpected adventures.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

title: Inception
description: A skilled thief who commits corporate espionage by infiltrating the subconscious minds of his targets is offered a chance to regain his old life as payment for a seemingly impossible task: "inception", the implantation of another person's idea into a target's subconscious.

title: WALLÂ·E
description: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

title: The Lives of Others
description: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the Stasi, the secret police, conducts surveillance on a writer and his lover, but finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed into their lives.

title: Sunset Blvd.
description: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded silent-screen star determined to make a triumphant return.

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific premonitions from both past and future.

title: Paths of Glory
description: After refusing to attack an enemy stronghold, a group of French soldiers are accused of cowardice and their commanding officer must struggle to save them from execution.

title: The Great Dictator
description: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
description: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: Witness for the Prosecution
description: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a trial that has many surprising twists.

title: Aliens
description: Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team that finds her drifting in space, and although the details of her story are initially met with skepticism, she soon finds herself fighting alongside a group of United States Colonial Marines against hordes of aliens on planet LV-426.

title: American Beauty
description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

title: The Dark Knight Rises
description: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
description: An insane American general orders a pre-emptive nuclear strike on the Soviet Union. A joint session of government officials and military experts try to stop the attack.

title: The Godfather: Part II
description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in the 1920s and his son Michael Corleone's rise to power in the 1950s.

title: 12 Angry Men
description: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

title: Old Boy
description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, a man is released and given five days to find his captor.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over several years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Toy Story 3
description: As Andy prepares to depart for college, his loyal toys find themselves headed for the attic.

title: Requiem for a Dream
description: "Requiem for a Dream" explores the lives of four people who are driven to the brink of insanity by their addiction to drugs.

title: 3 Idiots
description: In India, engineering students Rancho, Raju, and Farhan form a bond that defies academic expectations and societal pressures.
